product_name: Altra The Olympus Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: A crossover shoe built for women, The Olympus Trail-Running Shoes from Altra help you conquer rocky trails with their unique foot-shaped toe boxes and max-cushioned Zero Drop(TM) platforms. Flexible, max-cushioned Zero Drop platforms and foot-shaped toe boxes combine to place your feet in a natural position for an efficient, stable trail-running experience. 2-layer A-Bound(TM) cushioning offers flexible protection from gnarly terrain or the open road; The Olympus shoes have a 36mm total stack height. Lots of cushion is designed to reduce ankle sprains, stone bruising, overstriding, knee pain, forefoot pain and fatigue. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Uppers are constructed with quick-dry mesh. Altra The Olympus Trail-Running Shoes for women have trail-specific sticky rubber outsoles that provide good traction.
short_description: A crossover shoe built for women, The Olympus Trail-Running Shoes from Altra help you conquer rocky trails with their unique foot-shaped toe boxes and max-cushioned Zero Drop(TM) platforms.
